message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $10,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $17,000 is still a bit too steep for my budget. Would you be willing to meet somewhere in the middle, around $13,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for countering. $13,000 is getting closer, but to be honest, I'm really looking for closer to $16,000 for this product. It's high quality and I know you'd get a lot of use out of it.
Hi Alice, I understand the value of the product, but I have a strict budget.  Would you consider $14,000? That's the highest I can go.
